localize.tagline: 为非洲的开发人员和企业提供多渠道信息传递工具。

nodes.excerpt: ⚡ The Hashnode Blog Cards is a set of GET requests which will fetch the Blogs from your Hashnode ids with few parameters and will create SVG cards to bring 😎 awesomeness to your blog links. 🎉 Github link https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
nodes.title: Hashnode Blog Cards - Replace your Hashnode Blog links with Blogs Cards.
nodes.author: Sourav Dey

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一组GET请求，它将通过少量参数从你的Hashnode ids中获取博客，并将创建SVG卡，为你的博客链接带来😎惊艳。🎉 Github 链接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 将您的Hashnode博客链接替换为博客卡。

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一組GET請求，它將通過少量參數從你的Hashnode ids中獲取博客，並將創建SVG卡，爲你的博客鏈接帶來😎驚豔。🎉 Github 鏈接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 將您的Hashnode博客鏈接替換爲博客卡。

nodes.excerpt: A Powerful Mac* App to... • zoom into pixels • measure angles & distances • sample colors and maintain palettes • check alignments • real-time color-blindness and color-contrast • take snapshots • real-time distances and bounding boxes..and much, much more.
nodes.title: QuickLens - Inspect the UI of apps, illustrations & websites like a PRO!
nodes.author: Pavan Podila

localize.description: 一款功能强大的Mac*应用程序，用于... - 缩放像素 - 测量角度和距离 - 采样颜色和维护调色板 - 检查对齐 - 实时色盲和色彩对比 - 拍摄快照 - 实时距离和边界框......以及更多。
localize.tagline: 像专业人员一样检查应用程序、插图和网站的用户界面!

localize.description: 一款功能強大的Mac*應用程序，用於... - 縮放像素 - 測量角度和距離 - 採樣顏色和維護調色板 - 檢查對齊 - 實時色盲和色彩對比 - 拍攝快照 - 實時距離和邊界框......以及更多。
localize.tagline: 像專業人員一樣檢查應用程序、插圖和網站的用戶界面!

nodes.excerpt: CyberCat VPN is Your Unlimited, Encrypted, Fast & Ad Free VPN for iPhone & iPad. Welcome to a new world of internets with a super fast and secure no log VPN. Bring down the virtual walls and pounce on all the content you can handle.
nodes.title: CyberCat VPN - A privacy focused, Ad blocking, Unlimited VPN for iOS. Meow
nodes.author: James Stanley

localize.description: CyberCat VPN是您的iPhone和iPad的无限制，加密，快速和无广告的VPN。欢迎来到一个全新的网络世界，拥有一个超级快速和安全的无日志VPN。拆除虚拟墙，扑向所有你能处理的内容。
localize.tagline: 一款专注于隐私、广告屏蔽、无限VPN的iOS版。喵

localize.description: CyberCat VPN是您的iPhone和iPad的無限制，加密，快速和無廣告的VPN。歡迎來到一個全新的網絡世界，擁有一個超級快速和安全的無日誌VPN。拆除虛擬牆，撲向所有你能處理的內容。
localize.tagline: 一款專注於隱私、廣告屏蔽、無限VPN的iOS版。喵

nodes.excerpt: Booste APIs boiling all the pains of the production ML stack into a single line of code. We're super excited to launch an API to OpenAI's powerful new no-training-needed image classifier to Python and Node. Give it a spin!
nodes.title: CLIP API by Booste - Use OpenAI's newest image classifier with one line of code.
nodes.author: Erik Dunteman

localize.description: Booste APIs将生产ML堆栈的所有痛苦归结为一行代码。我们非常兴奋地推出了OpenAI强大的新的无需训练的图像分类器的API到Python和Node。快来试试吧
localize.tagline: 使用OpenAI最新的图像分类器，只需一行代码。

localize.description: Booste APIs將生產ML堆棧的所有痛苦歸結爲一行代碼。我們非常興奮地推出了OpenAI強大的新的無需訓練的圖像分類器的API到Python和Node。快來試試吧
localize.tagline: 使用OpenAI最新的圖像分類器，只需一行代碼。

nodes.excerpt: Learn vim without enduring boring text only tutorials. vim.so gets you the muscle repetition needed to master vim quickly using interactive exercises. Vim adds code editing super powers to your editor of choice. Learn vim fast today!
nodes.title: vim.so - Learn vim fast with interactive exercises in the browser
nodes.author: Kenneth Cassel 🐍

localize.description: vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。Vim 为您选择的编辑器增加了代码编辑的超级能力。今天就来快速学习vim吧！Vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。
localize.tagline: 通过浏览器中的互动练习快速学习vim。

localize.description: vim.so讓你通過互動練習快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重複練習。Vim 爲您選擇的編輯器增加了代碼編輯的超級能力。今天就來快速學習vim吧！Vim.so讓你通過互動練習快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重複練習。
localize.tagline: 通過瀏覽器中的互動練習快速學習vim。

nodes.excerpt: Say hello to Paperform V3! We’ve just released a bunch of new features that make Paperform easier to use than ever before. Features include **Guided Mode**, Slash Commands, Background videos and more.
nodes.title: Paperform V3 - The best form builder just got better.
nodes.author: Dean McPherson

localize.description: 跟Paperform V3打个招呼吧 我们刚刚发布了一系列新功能，使Paperform比以前更容易使用。功能包括**引导模式**、斜线命令、背景视频等。
localize.tagline: 最好的表格建立者只是变得更好。

localize.description: 跟Paperform V3打個招呼吧 我們剛剛發佈了一系列新功能，使Paperform比以前更容易使用。功能包括**引導模式**、斜線命令、背景視頻等。
localize.tagline: 最好的表格建立者只是變得更好。

nodes.excerpt: Generate a PDF from a URL. Simple, quick and easy. The idea behind this is simple. Don't spend your development time building complicated PDF infrastructure. Let us handle your PDF generation with a simple, asynchronous API.
nodes.title: PlutoPDF - A URL to PDF converter wrapped behind a simple API.
nodes.author: Scott Walker

localize.description: 从一个URL生成一个PDF。简单、快捷、方便。这背后的想法很简单。不要把您的开发时间花在构建复杂的PDF基础架构上。让我们用一个简单的、异步的API来处理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一个包裹在一个简单的API后面的URL到PDF转换器。

localize.description: 從一個URL生成一個PDF。簡單、快捷、方便。這背後的想法很簡單。不要把您的開發時間花在構建複雜的PDF基礎架構上。讓我們用一個簡單的、異步的API來處理您的PDF生成。
localize.tagline: 一個包裹在一個簡單的API後面的URL到PDF轉換器。

nodes.excerpt: Everyone speaks the same language - visual 🌅. So make your backend - visual! Draw your backend architecture, code right in the browser, and execute - all on the same whiteboard. Forget about logs or having to guess what your code does. SEE it in real time 😍
nodes.title: STATEWIZE - Visual software development ecosystem. Draw + Code + Execute
nodes.author: Lev Perlman

localize.description: 大家都在说同一种语言--可视化🌅。所以，让你的后台--可视化! 在浏览器中画出你的后端架构和代码，并在同一白板上执行。忘记日志或猜测你的代码做什么。实时查看😍
localize.tagline: 可视化软件开发生态系统。绘制+代码+执行

localize.description: 大家都在說同一種語言--可視化🌅。所以，讓你的後臺--可視化! 在瀏覽器中畫出你的後端架構和代碼，並在同一白板上執行。忘記日誌或猜測你的代碼做什麼。實時查看😍
localize.tagline: 可視化軟件開發生態系統。繪製+代碼+執行

nodes.excerpt: AwardsAdda is a centralized award repository, that caters to the needs to store and share your Awards & Achievements.
nodes.title: AwardsAdda -  AwardsAdda is a centralized award repository

localize.tagline: AwardsAdda是一个集中的奖项库。

nodes.excerpt: ISP Logger is an automated internet speed performance analytics tool. A small open source script performs a speed test on a docker image every hour and can be analysed on the easy to use Dashboard.
nodes.title: ISP Logger - Automated internet performance monitoring
nodes.author: Ronald Langeveld

localize.description: ISP Logger是一款自动化的网速性能分析工具。一个小型的开源脚本每隔一小时对docker镜像进行一次速度测试，并可以在易于使用的Dashboard上进行分析。
localize.tagline: 互联网性能自动监测

localize.description: ISP Logger是一款自動化的網速性能分析工具。一個小型的開源腳本每隔一小時對docker鏡像進行一次速度測試，並可以在易於使用的Dashboard上進行分析。
localize.tagline: 互聯網性能自動監測

nodes.excerpt: React Bundle by Flatlogic is a collection of various templates. You can see three admin templates with classic design, one with material one, a mobile starter template, a user management template, and an accounting template.
nodes.title: React Bundle - All premium React themes and templates
nodes.author: Nastassia Ovchinnikova

localize.description: Flatlogic的React Bundle是一个各种模板的集合。你可以看到三个经典设计的管理模板，一个是素材模板，一个是移动启动模板，一个是用户管理模板，一个是会计模板。
localize.tagline: 所有高级React主题和模板

nodes.excerpt: Toad is the simplest URL shortener with a built-in API, detailed analytics, and custom domain support. Toad is built to be fun yet powerful. What's stopping you? Make the leap!

nodes.excerpt: No more messy bookmarks. No more missing out. Dev Resources has everything a developer needs, presented in curated lists. Improve your skill set, find assets, discover your next favourite tool and get great discounts on digital products — all in one place.
nodes.title: Dev Resources - Collaborative list of resources for developers

localize.description: 不再有凌乱的书签。不再错过。开发资源拥有开发者所需的一切，并以精选列表的形式呈现。提高您的技能，寻找资产，发现您下一个最喜欢的工具，并获得数字产品的巨大折扣 - 所有这些都在一个地方。

nodes.excerpt: Get a video call and scheduler feature into your services in the blink of an eye. Wondercall 2.0 is the more powerful embedded video call system for any website & app. Now you can not only make calls but also schedule them. And the way to check all engagement!
nodes.title: Wondercall 2.0 - Add video call and scheduler into any service in seconds
nodes.author: Howie Young

localize.description: 在一眨眼的功夫，就能将视频通话和调度功能融入到您的服务中。Wondercall 2.0是更强大的嵌入式视频通话系统的任何网站和应用程序。现在，您不仅可以拨打电话，还可以安排他们。和方式来检查所有参与
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将视频呼叫和调度程序添加到任何服务中。

localize.description: 在一眨眼的功夫，就能將視頻通話和調度功能融入到您的服務中。Wondercall 2.0是更強大的嵌入式視頻通話系統的任何網站和應用程序。現在，您不僅可以撥打電話，還可以安排他們。和方式來檢查所有參與
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將視頻呼叫和調度程序添加到任何服務中。

nodes.excerpt: Pika (pronounced pi·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
nodes.title: Pika - An open-source colour picker app for macOS
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Pika（发音为pi-kuh，像picker）是一款简单易用、开源的macOS原生色彩采集器。Pika让你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的颜色变得很简单，所以你可以继续成为一个快速、成功的设计师。
localize.tagline: 一款适用于macOS的开源颜色挑选器应用。

localize.description: Pika（發音爲pi-kuh，像picker）是一款簡單易用、開源的macOS原生色彩採集器。Pika讓你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的顏色變得很簡單，所以你可以繼續成爲一個快速、成功的設計師。
localize.tagline: 一款適用於macOS的開源顏色挑選器應用。

nodes.excerpt: Iteratively prevents wasted time, increased costs, and poor decision-making from bad data by giving product, data and engineering teams the opportunity to collaborate on analytics while enforcing your schema. We empower you to take control of your data 🚀
nodes.title: Iteratively - Capture customer data you trust
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 通过给产品、数据和工程团队提供合作分析的机会，同时执行您的模式，迭代地防止因不良数据而浪费时间、增加成本和不良决策。我们使您能够控制您的数据🚀。
localize.tagline: 采集您信任的客户数据

localize.description: 通過給產品、數據和工程團隊提供合作分析的機會，同時執行您的模式，迭代地防止因不良數據而浪費時間、增加成本和不良決策。我們使您能夠控制您的數據🚀。

nodes.excerpt: Nwcode - is a no-code platform for building powerful web and mobile apps, that can include payments, notifications, and more. Integration with Woocommerce, Shopify in two clicks
nodes.title: Nwicode - Build apps for every platform, without code ✨

nodes.excerpt: Console is a free weekly email digest of the best tools and beta releases for developers. We keep track of everything - dev tools, devops, cloud, and APIs - so you don't have to.
nodes.title: Console - A free weekly email digest of the best tools for developers.
nodes.author: David Mytton

localize.description: Console是一个免费的每周电子邮件摘要，为开发者提供最好的工具和测试版本。我们跟踪一切--开发工具、devops、云和API--所以你不必跟踪。

localize.tagline: 每週免費的電子郵件摘要，爲開發者提供最好的工具。

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Smart Components in Framer, a new standard for interactive component design. From complete navigations and buttons with multiple states to nested hover effects, build anything visually and in just a few clicks—no code required. https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF
nodes.title: Smart Components by Framer - Design interactive components with multiple variants
nodes.author: Benjamin den Boer

localize.description: 在Framer中引入智能组件，这是一个交互式组件设计的新标准。从具有多种状态的完整导航和按钮到嵌套的悬停效果，只需点击几下就能建立任何视觉效果--无需代码。https://bit.ly/3jhgLVF。

nodes.title: Bunnyshell - Self-service DevOps automation for any application

localize.description: Bunnyshell是一个自助式的DevOps自动化平台，可以帮助团队缩短停机时间，并高速交付可靠的应用程序和服务。
localize.tagline: 针对任何应用的自助式DevOps自动化

nodes.excerpt: Data tables are all over the internet, especially Wikipedia. sqanything lets you query the HTML tables in all your open Chrome tabs with SQL. You can send the results of your query to Google Sheets or just send all the tables on a web page to Google Sheets.
nodes.title: sqanything - Query any data tables on the Web with SQL
nodes.author: Alex Iskold

localize.description: sqanything可以让你用SQL查询所有打开的Chrome标签页中的HTML表格。你可以将查询结果发送到Google Sheets，或者只是将网页上的所有表格发送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查询网络上的任何数据表。

localize.description: sqanything可以讓你用SQL查詢所有打開的Chrome標籤頁中的HTML表格。你可以將查詢結果發送到Google Sheets，或者只是將網頁上的所有表格發送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查詢網絡上的任何數據表。

nodes.excerpt: The "frosted glass" effect has been with us for quite some time with each company having its own name for it. In Nov 2020 Mike Malewicz wrote a medium article trying to unify it under one name. Then we created this handy CSS generator. Enjoy!
nodes.title: Glassmorphism CSS Generator - Generate the CSS for frosted glass effect for free.
nodes.author: michal malewicz

localize.description: "磨砂玻璃 "效果已经陪伴我们走过了相当长的时间，每个公司都有自己的名字。2020年11月，Mike Malewicz写了一篇媒介文章，试图将它统一在一个名字下。然后我们创建了这个方便的CSS生成器。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 免费生成磨砂玻璃效果的CSS。

localize.description: "磨砂玻璃 "效果已經陪伴我們走過了相當長的時間，每個公司都有自己的名字。2020年11月，Mike Malewicz寫了一篇媒介文章，試圖將它統一在一個名字下。然後我們創建了這個方便的CSS生成器。享受吧!
localize.tagline: 免費生成磨砂玻璃效果的CSS。

nodes.excerpt: Links are the glue of the internet, yet by themselves they're just a string of undecipherable characters. With Peekalink, turn them into rich content your users will be delighted to share and engage in.
nodes.title: Peekalink - An API to magically preview any link ✨
nodes.author: Joel Hernández

localize.description: 链接是互联网的粘合剂，但它们本身只是一串难以辨认的字符。有了Peekalink，将它们转化为丰富的内容，您的用户将乐于分享和参与。
localize.tagline: 一个可以神奇地预览任何链接的API✨。

localize.description: 鏈接是互聯網的粘合劑，但它們本身只是一串難以辨認的字符。有了Peekalink，將它們轉化爲豐富的內容，您的用戶將樂於分享和參與。
localize.tagline: 一個可以神奇地預覽任何鏈接的API✨。

nodes.excerpt: Three.js Journey is the ultimate course if you want to learn Three.js and create stunning 3D websites with WebGL. Let Bruno Simon guide you through more than 30 lessons covering basics and advanced usage of the library.
nodes.title: Three.js Journey - The best course to learn how to create stunning 3D websites
nodes.author: Bruno Simon

localize.description: 如果你想学习Three.js并使用WebGL创建令人惊叹的3D网站，Three.js Journey是终极课程。让Bruno Simon指导你完成30多节课，涵盖库的基础知识和高级用法。
localize.tagline: 学习如何创建令人惊叹的3D网站的最佳课程。

localize.description: 如果你想學習Three.js並使用WebGL創建令人驚歎的3D網站，Three.js Journey是終極課程。讓Bruno Simon指導你完成30多節課，涵蓋庫的基礎知識和高級用法。
localize.tagline: 學習如何創建令人驚歎的3D網站的最佳課程。
